response.original_title: The Hunting of Old Man Walker
response.overview: "When a young woman buys a mysterious old house for just $1, she thinks she's got a sweet deal. But soon, she's terrorized by the vengeful spirit of Old Man Walker, who seems determined to scare her out. As the hauntings escalate, she must find a way to outsmart the ghost and escape the house - if she dares."
response.title: The Hunting of Old Man Walker
